pkgmetadata.longdescription: Functional Regression using Signal Compression Approach // Signal compression methods for function-on-function (FOF) regression with functional response and functional predictors, including linear models with both scalar and functional predictors for a small number of functional predictors, linear models with functional predictors for a large number of functional predictors, and nonlinear models. Ruiyan Luo and Xin Qi (2017) doi:10.1080/01621459.2016.1164053.
